cookies_banner_description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content.
cookies_preferences_description: Manage your cookie preferences. Necessary cookies cannot be disabled as they are required for the website to function.
cookies_necessary_description: Essential for authentication, security and basic functionality. These cannot be disabled.
cookies_analytics_description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website to improve user experience.
cookies_marketing_description: Used to track visitors across websites for personalized advertising.
